main event: Three silver colored objects observed in St. Louis, Missouri on 17 November 1955.
interesting points: The objects were described as being silver on top and dark on the bottom., They flew in formation with 3 abreast and 4 deep., The duration of the observation was 25 seconds., The objects disappeared over the horizon after being observed for 15 seconds., The report concluded there was insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: Mr. aged 64, a semi-retired resident; Mrs. aged 62, a housewife, both from St. Louis.
